      • checkClientLastMoods

        public boolean checkClientLastMoods(java.lang.String mood,
                           long timeLapse,
                           int numMoods)
        Check if client's last received numMoods moods are equal to mood and inside the time interval.
        Parameters:
        mood - The mood to be checked.
        timeLapse - The time interval.
        numMoods - Number of moods to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the last received numMoods are inside the time interval, otherwise false.
